description: This file defines an interface IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, consisting of pure virtual methods for handling various events related to runtime, window management, ripple, and state changes. It serves as a contract for implementing event handling behavior in components that process JSON data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface declaring callback methods for different event types related to runtime, window, ripple, and state change events, with JSON payload handling.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles runtime management events with associated JSON data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles window management events with associated JSON data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handles ripple events identified by a name and associated JSON data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handles state change events with associated JSON data.
